system.name: Simple Improvements
system.effect:
Trigger - Your Normal-Type Pokémon gains Initiative
Effect: Add your Type-Linked Skill Rank to all of your Pokémon’s rolls this turn. Your Pokémon gains Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Simple Improvements may only be used once per Scene per Pokémon.
system.prerequisites: Extra Ordinary, Type-Linked Skill at Master
